channel.title: 317[PI] Toggle X10 HP
channel.description: Okay guys. so i want to add a toggle (server sided) in my quest tab. I'm already pretty comfortable with adding clicking most buttons but i wanna add a toggle. Can any of you wonderful gentlemen/ladies make a code or something i can pack in?

item.title: 317[PI] Toggle X10 HP
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Well if u are already familiar to clicking then u should be able to add that without help,

something like

if button id == # && toggle = false { toggle =true; } if button id == # && toggle = true { toggle = false; }

Read full topic
